name: Hit Lockout Street 3D
description:
Hit Lockout Street 3D is a really classic fighting game, to become boxing supremacy, dazzling skills unlimited bursts.Violent blow cool feeling,exquisite game screen,the ups and downs of the story, allowing the player to smooth cool high-quality action game.Like action game players not to be missed!
Features:
- Cool special skills!
- Wonderful story
- Skills upgrades
- Multiple levels and scenarios
- Entertaining physics engine
